description: Defines mandatory, zero-impact test scenarios required for validation of updated Policy Veto Logic (PVLM) and Core Failure Thresholds (CFTM) prior to PEUP promotion.

scenarios.description: Verify that core system tautologies (e.g., integrity > 0, resource allocation < budget) are not vetoed by the proposed PVLM.
Validate that tolerance boundaries (epsilon) allow expected standard deviation while critically failing on proven failure vectors.
Ensure no circular veto logic or self-locking conditions are introduced that would prevent all valid GSEP-C execution paths.
